channel.title: CVE Feed for Ministry of Justice -- Installer of Shogyo Touki Denshi Ninsho Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ministry of Justice -- Installer of Shogyo Touki Denshi Ninsho Software

item.title: CVE-2017-2177|2024-08-05T13:48:04.294Z -- ministry%20of%20justice -- installer%20of%20shogyo%20touki%20denshi%20ninsho%20software
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of Shogyo Touki Denshi Ninsho Software Ver 1.7 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
